It can also be inferred that the user enjoys movies with complex and well-developed characters, as many of their favourite movies feature characters that undergo significant development over the course of the story. The user also seems to enjoy movies that tackle difficult and thought-provoking themes, as many of their favourite movies deal with weighty subjects such as war, identity, and relationships.
